channel.title: Thinking about hosting a Poker Website
channel.description:
So yea.. Im thinking of hosting a poker website,
Consisting of a forums and probably a site.
I can get the .com domain i want for £7 a year, or with .net, .info and .org for £9 a year more just gonna get the .com for now
So im just wondering, Would anyone fancy helping to contribute to the making of this site.. and also what are some good hosting companys?
Bought the domain name
Everything is bought.. just need to set it up.
BTW its all with godaddy

item.title: Thinking about hosting a Poker Website
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Small update, my mate said he would go halfs if we start off small and what not.

So were gonna buy the “www.wypoker.co.uk” standing for west yorkshire poker.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Thinking about hosting a Poker Website
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Meh I hope you have good luck with them. I had them once and it was near the worst hosting experience I had. What plan do you have unlimited bandwith and diskspace. I went with hostgators $5 dollar plan the first time I went with them and the domain name was free.

Read full topic
